headline: KKR and Bain Capital Each Bid over $5 Billion for Seven & i's York Holdings Spin-Off
summary: Private equity firms KKR & Co. Inc. and Bain Capital, LP each offered more than $5 billion in first-round bids for the non-core assets of Japan's Seven & i Holdings Co., Ltd. , according to people...

headline: Bain, KKR Bids Touch $7.6 Billion for Seven & i Assets: Reuters
summary: (Bloomberg) -- KKR & Co. and Bain Capital LP are among private equity firms that have made offers for the non-core assets of Seven & i Holdings Co., Reuters reported Wednesday citing unidentified sources.Most Read from BloombergHo Chi Minh City Opens First Metro Line After Years of DelayReviving a Little-Known Modernist Landmark in BuffaloThe Architects Who Built MiamiNew York’s Congestion Pricing Plan Still Faces Legal HurdlesMexico City to Boost Mobility, Security Ahead of FIFA World CupFirst-
